revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Fiery Path |image = [[File:Fiery Path.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Fiery Path. |tokens = 17,000 |location = North of Mauville City, east of Lavaridge Town. }} '''Fiery Path''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 424,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer |- | [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Slugma.png|40px]] Slugma |- | [[File:Numel.png|40px]] Numel |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Torkoal.png|40px]] Torkoal || <center>1,200,000 || colspan=3|<center> N/A |- |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
